item.description: Kathleen Marden,the niece of Betty Hill and the co-author with Stanton Friedman of the new book "Captured! The Betty and Barney Hill Ufo experience"will lecture. Friedman will not be there, but it should be interesting nonetheless!
item.how_to_find_us: You'll see my white van in the lot (with a 17' yellow kayak strapped to the roof), and I'll be the guy who looks like my picture! See y'all there!
item.name: Kathleen Marden Lecture II
